summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to municipal elections; providing for the limitation of constributions to Municipal Election campaigns and establishing a system of public election campaign financing; amending Sections 2, 16 and 21 of Ordinance 106653 (Fair Campaign Practices Ordinance) and adding thereto new sections 13-A, 13-B, 13-C, 13-D, 13-E, 13-F, 13-G, 13-H, 13-I, 13-J and 13-K.
